title: Short-Intensive Job-Linked English Speaking Competency Enhancement Course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English grammar and vocabulary comprehension
context.additional_context: A professional development program for pre-service or in-service teachers to enhance teaching competencies. Aims to improve English conversational skills required in work environments for professionals in medical, legal, and technical fields. Conducted via smartphone-based learning in environments without PC access.

learning_goals: Learners can use 20 job-related core English expressions (greetings, explanations, negotiations) with 80% accuracy
Learners can maintain clear pronunciation and intonation during 5-minute role-play performances for work scenarios
Learners can complete daily 15-minute speaking practice via mobile apps with over 80% adherence

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
